name: test_e2e_with_logs[233_CMD_REVSH_002]
description:

| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_REVSH_002` |
| **Name** | Netcat reverse shell |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | reverse_shell |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |
